text.content: i was hype for this one for very long time when the teaser trailer came out last year (or is it mid 2020?). closer to the releasing date, i asked a friend who was also a fan of this kinda comic book movie to see if heâ€™s interested in seeing it and he said ok. fast forward to the opening day, i couldnâ€™t make it to the premiere cuz i had covid. after a week i felt like the right time and i asked him again but he replied he got covid. a week later i asked him and he said heâ€™s still recovering and told me to wait on his test. he havenâ€™t text me since then soğŸ˜... my hype was sort of fading away till i saw the deleted scene between batman and joker (well, i didnâ€™t technically see it, i glanced at it on the newsfeed in yt, plus i saw a lot of interview of pattinson and kravitz lately) then i my hype was pumped right up to the max man, booked the ticket a day after.
